title: Hello Baby: Parenting app for best baby moments
description:
Smart parental assistant. Represent first 6 years of your baby! Keep all impressions about baby by the whole family. Private and secure.
STORY OF YOUR BABY
Hello Baby is a cross-platform baby scrapbook album with many additional services. Add baby photos, videos, audio or funny notes. We always keep the maximum resolution. Photo filters and stickers can be changed or removed even after saving. Invite relatives and track memories together.
MILESTONES
Never miss any milestones: first word, first step, first tooth, first bathing and more. The more you tell about baby, the more relevant features and content you get.
FEATURES
Stickers. More than 500 beautiful dynamic stickers.
Printed albums. Get amazing personal printed story based on events of your baby in seconds. Automatically.
Video stories. Generate a stunning video from baby's events.
Measurements. Track baby weight and length.
COMMUNITY
Share your stories. Get daily parental tips from experts. Follow top parents.
MARKET
Buy best baby goods in the most personalized​ marketplace.
NEARBY
Find the best baby activities in your city.
Feel free to send your feedback: hello@babyalbum.com
